== Pananchery (627815) ==

Pananchery is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 8009 hectares and harbouring 4889 households with total population of 19832 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 9656 and female population is 10176. Scheduled Caste Population is 1704 and Scheduled Tribes population is 307. Census Location Code of the village is 627815<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
